attributes.label: RMP Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the RMP area.

attributes.label: State
attributes.description: Two-letter state or territory code.

attributes.label: Effective Date
attributes.description: Date the plan or designation became effective.

attributes.label: Fire Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the fire event.

attributes.label: Fire Name
attributes.description: Common name of the fire, if assigned.

attributes.label: Acres Burned
attributes.description: Total acres burned within the fire perimeter.

attributes.label: Discovery Date
attributes.description: Date the fire was first discovered.

attributes.label: ACEC Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the ACEC.

attributes.label: ACEC Name
attributes.description: Official name of the ACEC.

attributes.label: Example Attribute
attributes.description: This example attribute exists to demonstrate and explain the attribute fields shown in the catalog UI (ID, Label, Type, Nullable, Description, Example, and Allowed values for enumerated types).
attributes.example: Sample value used only for demonstration.

attributes.label: Estimated Feature Count
attributes.description: Approximate number of features or records in the dataset.

attributes.label: Official Program Layer
attributes.description: Indicates whether this dataset is the officially endorsed program layer for its topic.

attributes.label: Managing Agency
attributes.description: Primary federal agency responsible for managing the feature.

values.label: BLM
values.description: Bureau of Land Management

values.label: NPS
values.description: National Park Service

values.label: USFS
values.description: U.S. Forest Service

values.label: USFWS
values.description: U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service

values.label: BOR
values.description: Bureau of Reclamation

attributes.label: Access Sensitivity
attributes.description: High-level data sensitivity category for sharing and public access.

values.label: Public
values.description: Suitable for open public release.

values.label: CUI
values.description: Controlled Unclassified Information; share only per policy.

values.label: Internal only
values.description: Internal use only; not cleared for public release.

attributes.label: RMP Status
attributes.description: Planning status of the Resource Management Plan.

values.label: Approved
values.description: Approved RMP with decisions currently in effect.

values.label: Draft
values.description: Draft RMP in review and not yet approved.

values.label: In revision
values.description: Existing RMP currently being amended or revised.

attributes.label: Fire Cause
attributes.description: Best-known primary cause of the fire.

values.label: Lightning
values.description: Ignition caused by lightning or other natural sources.

values.label: Human-caused
values.description: Ignition caused by human activity.

values.label: Unknown
values.description: Cause has not been determined or recorded.

attributes.label: ACEC Status
attributes.description: Current designation status of the ACEC.

values.label: Designated
values.description: ACEC is currently designated and in effect.

values.label: Proposed
values.description: ACEC has been proposed but is not yet designated.

values.label: Released
values.description: ACEC designation has been removed or is no longer in effect.

attributes.label: WSA Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the Wilderness Study Area.

attributes.label: WSA Name
attributes.description: Official name of the Wilderness Study Area.

attributes.label: WSA Status
attributes.description: Current status of the Wilderness Study Area.

values.label: Pending
values.description: WSA is under review and not yet resolved.

values.label: Designated Wilderness
values.description: WSA has been designated as wilderness by Congress.

values.label: Released
values.description: WSA has been released from further wilderness consideration.

attributes.label: Lease Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the oil and gas lease.

attributes.label: Lease Status
attributes.description: Current administrative status of the lease.

values.label: Active
values.description: Lease is currently in effect.

values.label: Expired
values.description: Lease has expired according to its terms.

values.label: Terminated
values.description: Lease has been terminated or canceled.

values.label: Pending
values.description: Lease is pending issuance or approval.

attributes.label: Operator Name
attributes.description: Name of the designated lease operator or lessee.

attributes.label: Commodity
attributes.description: Primary mineral commodity covered by the lease.

values.label: Oil
values.description: Lease is primarily for oil.

values.label: Gas
values.description: Lease is primarily for gas.

values.label: Oil and Gas
values.description: Lease covers both oil and gas.

values.label: Other
values.description: Lease covers other mineral commodities.

attributes.label: ROW Identifier
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the right-of-way authorization.

attributes.label: ROW Type
attributes.description: Type of facility or use authorized by the right-of-way.

values.label: Transmission Line
values.description: Electric transmission line right-of-way.

values.label: Pipeline
values.description: Pipeline right-of-way.

values.label: Road
values.description: Road or access route right-of-way.

values.label: Other
values.description: Other type of authorized facility or use.
